text: Krystian Popiela (19 January 1998 – 9 September 2018) was a Polish professional footballer who played as a striker. ==Career== Born in Tarnów, Popiela began his early career with Fivos Varis, Olympiacos, Białe Orły and Polonia Warsaw, before joining Italian club Cagliari in January 2016. He later played for Wisła Płock, Olimpia Grudziądz, Unia Tarnów and Stal Rzeszów. ==Death== He died in a car crash on 9 September 2018, at the age of 20. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Polish footballers Category:Olympiacos F.C. players Category:Polonia Warsaw players Category:Cagliari Calcio players Category:Wisła Płock players Category:Olimpia Grudziądz players Category:Unia Tarnów players Category:Stal Rzeszów players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:I liga players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Italy Category:Expatriate footballers in Italy Category:Road incident deaths in Poland
